metadata.name: Milk Carton
metadata.description:
In 1915 the US Patent Office granted John R. Van Wormer a toy manufacturer from Ohio, USA a patent for his waxed cardboard milk carton. Particularly his invention adressed containers made of paper. He spent a decade developing both product and market, incl. a machine designed to form, fill and seal the cartons. 
This 3d infite loop animation was made with 12 different instances of a 3d milk carton model made with voxels. A unique technique was applied to realize this animation in Magicavoxel software.
Duration: 7s.
Resolution 1500*1500 pixels.
Here the full story: https://8ty.one/8bit_retro/#2021-11-24
